- **Objects 0 and 1 are also not blickets** (since they did not turn the machine on).

The rule for the machine appears to be that it turns on when at least one blicket is present. Since object 2 is the only object that has consistently turned the machine on, it is the only confirmed blicket.

Now, I will take the next step to confirm my findings by putting object 2 back on the machine to see if the light turns on again.

> put object 2 on machine
